00010 /** Fetch All Customers Test Method
00011  *  @brief This method tries to test the "fetchAllCustomers" method of "CustomerManagement" class.
00012  *  @author Efstathios Xatzikiriakidis
00013  */
00014 void TCustomerManagement::testFetchAllCustomers ()
00015 {
00016   QString idA ("AX1111");
00017   QString surnameA ("Joanna");
00018   QString nameA ("Johanson");
00019   int groupA = 1;
00020 
00021   Customer custA (idA, nameA, surnameA, groupA);
00022 
00023   QString idB ("BX1111");
00024   QString surnameB ("John");
00025   QString nameB ("Hercules");
00026   int groupB = 2;
00027 
00028   Customer custB (idB, nameB, surnameB, groupB);
00029 
00030   CustomerManagement cm;
00031 
00032   cm.newCustomer (custA);
00033   cm.newCustomer (custB);
00034 
00035   vector<Customer> custs = cm.fetchAllCustomers ();
00036 
00037   QVERIFY (custs.size () == 2);
00038 }

00040 /** Search Customer By Value Test Method
00041  *  @brief This method tries to test the "searchCustomerByValue" method of "CustomerManagement" class.
00042  *  @author Efstathios Xatzikiriakidis
00043  */
00044 void TCustomerManagement::testSearchCustomerByValue ()
00045 {
00046   QString id ("AX2222");
00047   QString surname ("Michael");
00048   QString name ("Johinson");
00049   QString key ("Joh");
00050   int group = 3;
00051 
00052   Customer cust (id, name, surname, group);
00053   CustomerManagement cm;
00054 
00055   cm.newCustomer (cust);
00056   vector<Customer> custs = cm.searchCustomerByValue (key);
00057 
00058   QVERIFY (custs.size () == 3);
00059 }

00061 /** New Customer Test Method
00062  *  @brief This method tests the "newCustomer" method of the "CustomerManagement" class.
00063  *  @author Efstathios Xatzikiriakidis
00064  */
00065 void TCustomerManagement::testNewCustomer ()
00066 {
00067   QString id ("AX3333");
00068   QString surname ("Malkovich");
00069   QString name ("Peter");
00070   int group = 1;
00071 
00072   Customer temp, cust (id, name, surname, group);
00073   CustomerManagement cm;
00074 
00075   cm.newCustomer (cust);
00076   temp = cm.fetchCustomer (id);
00077 
00078   QVERIFY (cust.getId ()      == temp.getId ()      &&
00079            cust.getName ()    == temp.getName ()    &&
00080            cust.getSurname () == temp.getSurname () &&
00081            cust.getGroupId () == temp.getGroupId ());
00082 }

00107 /** Delete Customer Test Method
00108  *  @brief This method tests the "deleteCustomer" method of the "CustomerManagement" class.
00109  *  @author Efstathios Xatzikiriakidis
00110  */
00111 void TCustomerManagement::testDeleteCustomer ()
00112 {
00113   QString id ("AX3333");
00114   Customer cust, temp;
00115   CustomerManagement cm;
00116 
00117   cust.setId (id);
00118   cm.deleteCustomer (cust);
00119   temp = cm.fetchCustomer (id);
00120 
00121   QVERIFY (cust.getId () != temp.getId ());
00122 }

00148  *  @brief This method tests the "checkInData" method of the "CustomerManagement" class.
00149  *  @author Efstathios Xatzikiriakidis
00150  */
00151 void TCustomerManagement::testCheckInData ()
00152 {
00153   QString empty ("");
00154   Customer cust;
00155   CustomerManagement cm;
00156 
00157   cust.setId (empty);
00158   cust.setName (empty);
00159   cust.setSurname (empty);
00160 
00161   QVERIFY (cm.checkInData (cust) == false);
00162 }
